description: Utility that provides toggle (show/hide) behaviour to a <button> or <a> tag and a target.

demos.title: Toggle display on/off.
demos.name: display-toggle
demos.description: This toggle target has a class "o-toggle-display" which hides it until clicking the toggle updates its aria attributes and adds the "o-toggle--active" class.

demos.title: Toggle visibility.
demos.name: visibility-toggle
demos.description: This toggle target has a class "o-toggle-visibility" which visually hides it, whilst still occupying space, until clicking the toggle updates its aria attributes and adds the "o-toggle--active" class.
